snippet: Haley Anderson, a recent graduate of the University of Southern California, and Oussama Mellouli of Tunisia, who is based at U.S.C., both won gold medals.
abstract: American Haley Anderson, recent graduate of University of Southern California, and Oussama Mellouli of Tunisia, who is based at USC, both win gold medals at swimming world championships.
lead_paragraph: Haley Anderson, a recent graduate of the University of Southern California, and Oussama Mellouli of Tunisia, who is based at U.S.C., both won gold medals.

headline.main: Two From U.S.C. Take Open-Water Events
headline.print_headline: Two From U.S.C. Take Open-Water Events
